name: customer_service_email
instruction: Write a thank you email for given target people.

instances.input: To the customer who purchased [item], and gave us a five star review. We want to give them a 5% discount on next purchase.
instances.output:
Dear [customer],
Thank you for your recent purchase of [item] and for taking the time to leave us a glowing five-star review. We appreciate your support and are thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience with our product.

As a token of our appreciation, we would like to offer you a 5% discount on your next purchase with us. Simply use the code [CODE] at checkout to redeem your discount.

Thank you again for choosing our brand, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

name: HR_interview_email
instruction: Write a thank you email for given target people.

instances.input: To a candidate who interviewed for a position. Politely let them know we would like to schedule another interview
instances.output:
Dear [candidate],
Thank you for taking the time to interview for the [position] role at [company]. We appreciate your interest in the position and the effort you put into the interview.

After careful consideration, we would like to schedule another interview with you to further discuss your qualifications and experience for the role. Our team would like to learn more about your skills and how they align with our company's needs.

Please let us know your availability for the next round of interviews, and we will coordinate a time that works best for you. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Thank you again for your time and interest in joining our team.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

name: sale_outreach_email
instruction: Write me a sales outreach email for a given scenario.

instances.input: To a high net worth person based on a referral. Discuss a new investment product at our bank. Use polite, professional tone
instances.output:
Dear [Prospect],

I am reaching out because I was recently referred to you as a high net worth individual who may be interested in learning about our new investment product at [Bank Name].

Our team at [Bank Name] is always striving to provide our clients with the best investment opportunities available, and we believe that our latest offering may be of interest to you.

This investment product is designed to provide high returns with low risk, making it an ideal choice for those looking to diversify their portfolio. Our team of experts has worked tirelessly to develop this product, and we are confident that it will meet your investment needs. 

Best regards,

[Your Name]

name: job_application_email
instruction: Write me a job application with attached resume and cover letter sent to a recruiter. Use the given tones.

instances.output:
Dear Sir or Madam,
I am reaching out because I am very interested in the job opportunity that your company is offering. Please find attached my resume and cover letter for your review.

As you will see from my resume, I have extensive experience in the field and am confident that I would be a valuable addition to your team. I am a highly motivated individual who is always eager to learn and take on new challenges. My strong communication and organizational skills, as well as my ability to work well under pressure, make me an excellent candidate for the position.

Thank you for taking the time to consider my application. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

name: employee_wellbeing_email
instruction: Write a short email from HR to an employee who is sick, following some requirements.

instances.input: The email should check up on their health and reminding them to mark a sick day. Use polite, kind tone
instances.output:
Dear [colleague],
I hope this email finds you well. I just wanted to check in and see how you are feeling. I understand that you have been sick and I hope that you are taking the time you need to rest and recover.

I also wanted to remind you to mark your sick day in our system so that we can keep track of your time off. If you need any assistance with this, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.

Take care of yourself and let me know if there is anything we can do to support you during this time.

Best regards,

[Your name]

name: refuse_invitation_email
instruction: Reply to the email and refuse the invitation politely based on the received email.

instances.input:
Here is the email. 

Dear ARR Reviewer,
Many thanks for your continuous support of ARR. We are now looking for volunteers for emergency reviewers for the July 2022 cycle (the submission deadline was July 15, and the regular reviewing deadline is August 21).
Emergency reviewing will take place between August 21 and August 28. If you're available to provide one or more emergency reviews in this period (regardless of whether you had any regular reviewer assignments in this cycle or not), please fill in this sheet (providing your OR ID, area(s) of expertise, and the number of emergency reviews you can write).
Many thanks to all volunteers in advance!
Best regards, 
ARR EiCs
instances.output:
Hello, 
Thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, I am not available during that period to provide emergency reviews. 
Best, 
[Name]

name: decline_a_job_offer_email
instruction: Turn down a job offer by sending an email to a recruiter explaining the reason.

instances.input: Reason: You decided to accept a different offer.
instances.output:
Hi  [Recruiter],
Thank you so much for the generous offer to join your team. As we discussed, I’ve admired the company for a number of years, and am a proud endorser of its products. However, after further consideration of where I currently am in my career, I’ve decided to accept an offer at another company.
I would love to stay in touch with you and have already started following you on [Social Media Platform]. Again, thank you so much for your time and consideration.

Thanks again,
[Your Name]
